A-Frame Physics Extras Example Page

This is the examples page for the aframe-physics-extras WebVR package.

Collision Physics Settings

  • Open hands can pass through objects
  • With a pointing gesture (trackpad on Vive wands), hands become solid and can push objects around
  • Reach inside objects and use grip or trigger to pick up and move

Example of toggling the collisionForces property of collision-filter to affect whether the controllers have physical interactions with the environment or not.

Merging Physics Bodies
